code: import React from"react";import{Button}from"reactstrap";import{ActionAddMovie}from'../reducers/moviesReducer';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import axios from'axios';var AddMovies=function AddMovies(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var addMovie=function addMovie(data){return axios({method:'post',url:'http://localhost:5000/posts',data:data});};return React.createElement(Button,{color:"dark",style:{marginBottom:"2rem"},onClick:function onClick(){var namePrompt=prompt("Enter what U want");if(namePrompt){var update={id:Math.floor(Math.random()*Math.floor(5000)),title:'Vartago',desc:namePrompt};addMovie(update);dispatch(ActionAddMovie(update));}}},"Ajouter un Film");};export default AddMovies;
